document.full_text: golf's former world number one vijay singh is in danger of missing his first major in 17 years after failing to turn up for a qualifying event for next week's u.s. open at congressional.
document.title: singh's major streak in danger after skipping qualifying
lines_and_colors: golf's former world number one vijay singh is in danger of missing his first major in 17 years after failing to turn up for a qualifying event for next week's u.s. open at congressional.
